comments.text:
When I put my mouse cursor over a link (hover) as long as the tooltip is displayed, the representation is corrected until I move the cursor back of the link. It seems to be, that this effect only happens the first time i have moved my cursor over a link on a site.

Also in web-forms the effect occurs, if you want to select a stored default value for a field. In this case, it is extremely disturbing since firefox constantly changes between incorrect and correct representation.

The black pixel line on bottom will always be shown, but is not needed.
